https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iiofZ6DP4Ak8OYG8Mk6cDCkd8RY.jpg An older Nopporn looks at a simple painting and recollects the story behind it. As a young student in Japan, he once met and fell in love with Keerati, who was unhappily married to an older man. Behind the Painting
